sorular.soru: Which sign refers to the maximum allowed width of a vehicle on the road?

feedback.metin: Sign C-18 indicates that your vehicle, including its cargo, may not be more than 2.3 metres wide to enter this road. Sign C-17 shows a maximum length of your vehicle with which you can enter this road and sign C-19 a maximum height.

sorular.soru: Your trailer is 8 metres long. In which situation are you allowed to overtake the lorry?

feedback.metin: Only in situation B are you allowed to overtake the lorry. With a car and trailer combination over 7 metres long, you may only use the two rightmost lanes on the motorway. In situation A, you drive on the left lane of the three lanes. You are not allowed to drive here, and are therefore also not allowed to overtake here.

sorular.soru: Which dashboard light indicates that the front fog lights are switched on?

feedback.metin: The left light indicates that the front fog light is switched on. The middle light indicates that the rear fog light is switched on, and the right light indicates that the full-beam headlights are switched on.

sorular.soru: Which symbol indicates that the windscreen washer fluid is running low?

feedback.metin: The middle symbol indicates that the windscreen washer fluid is low and needs to be refilled. Driving when the windscreen washer fluid has run out completely is prohibited, as you may then be subject to reduced visibility. Especially in winter, this is very dangerous because of the salt on the roads and the low sun. The left symbol indicates that the engine temperature is too high and the right symbol indicates that the windscreen heater or evaporation is on.

sorular.soru: In which situation is parking allowed?

feedback.metin: Signs E-1 (no parking) and E-2 (no stopping) apply only to that side of the carriageway where they are placed. On the upper two situations, an E-1 sign is on the side of the carriageway where you are parked and parking is therefore prohibited. In the bottom right situation the E-2 sign is on the other side of the carriageway and does not apply to the side where you are parked. So parking is allowed here. In the bottom left situation, there is no sign prohibiting parking at all, and so parking is also allowed.
